text.0: bṚhaspati lead us safely over troubles and turn his evil thought against the sinner.
text.1: repel the curse and drive away illfeeling and give the sacrificer peace and comfort.
text.2: may narāśaṁsa aid us at prayāja blest be our anuyāja at invokings.
text.3: may he repel the curse and chase illfeeling and give the sacrificer peace and comfort.
text.4: may he whose head is flaming burn the demons haters of prayer so that the arrow slay them.
text.5: may he repel the curse and chase illfeeling and give the sacrificer peace and comfort.
